title: CIDER: Commonsense Inference for Dialogue Explanation and Reasoning
summary: This work introduces CIDER â€“ a manually curated dataset that contains dyadic dialogue explanations in the form of implicit and explicit knowledge triplets inferred using contextual commonsense inference that can be conducive to improving several downstream applications.
authors: Deepanway Ghosal,Pengfei Hong,Siqi Shen,Navonil Majumder,Rada Mihalcea,Soujanya Poria
